PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-11672013-11-07,  ,  ,  ,  CH
ActBroadcasting Act
SubjectCanadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission ** Report **
PrecisOrder requesting that the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission issue a report on how the ability of Canadian consumers to subscribe to pay and specialty television services on a service-by-service basis can be maximized.
AttachmentsAttachment
